itunes:title: The Hard Truth About Long Distances Relationships & 5 Tips To Make Them Better
title: The Hard Truth About Long Distances Relationships & 5 Tips To Make Them Better
itunes:author: Joey Kidney
itunes:subtitle: LDR Needs To End
itunes:summary:
LDR relationships are hard - they are a lot of work. But it doesn't mean that they aren't possible. So let's talk about it. Here are my 5 big points and 5 tips to have a successful long distance relationship
